Articles.Content:
So I would like the colours tab to be a bit more user friendly.

- A 'switch colours' button. To switch the the Base and Accent colours around

- A colour picker (pick colour from e.g. your selected flag. Or other items on the screen)

- A hex code option

- An "undo 'set agency'" button

Feel free to comment on more changes / additions needed.

Edited November 10, 2023 by Abelinoss
I can't test this right now, but I hear that pressing the  paint button doesn't close the paint UI, which it should like all the other UI buttons there
My main complain is that I can not safe more than one color options. A colar hexagon would also be nice to have more consistant colors
honestly yeah, an eyedropper tool would be fantastic.
